item.title: Mission & Scope
item.description: Mission Our mission is to promote appreciation and conservation of starry skies across the southeastern United States.

item.title: Our Region
item.description: Our proposed region includes Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, Georgia, and South Carolina.
